dashboard.title: Valorant Skin Tracker Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage your Valorant skin wishlist and track skin prices

tokenRequired.description: You need to set up your Riot account tokens to access the store and use all features.

nightmarket.title: Night Market

tokenCli.title: Auto Token Fetcher
tokenCli.subtitle: Automatically fetch tokens using browser cookies

advantages.title: Auto Token Fetcher Advantages:
advantages.easier: Easier - only need 2 cookies from browser
advantages.faster: Faster - no manual copy/paste of multiple tokens

instructions.title: How to Get Browser Cookies:

instructions.step2: Make sure you're logged in to your Riot Games account

security.title: Security:
security.description: Cookies are only used once to fetch tokens and are not stored. Tokens are stored securely to access your Valorant store.

tokenCli.success: Tokens successfully fetched and saved! You can now use all bot features.

errors.missingFields: Please fill in all required fields.
errors.invalidSsid: Invalid ssid cookie. Make sure you copied the complete ssid cookie value.
errors.invalidClid: Invalid clid cookie. Make sure you copied the complete clid cookie value.
errors.authFailed: Authentication failed. Your cookies may be expired or invalid. Please get fresh cookies from your browser.
errors.invalidCookies: Invalid or expired cookies. Please log in again in your browser and get fresh cookies.
errors.fetchFailed: Failed to fetch tokens. Please try again or use manual setup method.
errors.ssidTooShort: SSID cookie too short. Make sure you copied the complete value.
errors.clidTooShort: CLID cookie too short. Make sure you copied the complete value.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.message: The page you are looking for does not exist.

tokenCli.noTokens: You need to set up your Riot tokens first to access the store.
tokenCli.tokenCheckFailed: Unable to verify your tokens. Please try setting them up again.
